# Conspirators
[color=#999999][italic]"We are the chill wind on a winter's day. We are the shadow in the moonless night. We are the poison in your tea and the whisper in your ear. We are everywhere."[/italic][/color]
The Conspiracy are a group of crew members who will collaborate to bring a sinister conspiracy to life. Conspirators are indifferentiable from crew members, but inherently know each other and are implanted with a [color=cyan]conspiracy radio implant[/color], allowing them to communicate with each other.
## Playing as a Conspirator
Conspiring is rather simple. - Check your character menu to see the identities of the other conspirators, as well as your [bold]objective[/bold]. This objective is only a suggestion. If the conspirators all agree to do something else, they are free to. - Use your radio implant [color=yellow][bold](:o)[/color][/bold] to communicate with your fellow conspirators. - Work together with the other conspirators to bring your dreams to life, at the crew's expense.
